title: 玩家进入区域就崩溃
author: 東風导弹炸東京
txt_content:
某个玩家一进入某区域服务器就会崩溃重启我用ClearLagg插件试过清除那块区域的实体，但是还是会崩溃重启
求各位dalao看看怎么解决！报错文件呈上：










报错文件.txt


2017-8-2 11:12 上传
点击文件名下载附件




8.31 KB, 下载次数: 8


报错文件

replies.author: 炫迈吃益达
replies.txt_content:
打开服务端文件夹-config-forge后
找到    # Set this to true to remove any Entity that throws an error in its update method instead of closing the server and reporting a crash log. BE WARNED THIS COULD SCREW UP EVERYTHING USE SPARINGLY WE ARE NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR DAMAGES.
    B:removeErroringEntities=false

    # Set this to true to remove any TileEntity that throws an error in its update method instead of closing the server and reporting a crash log. BE WARNED THIS COULD SCREW UP EVERYTHING USE SPARINGLY WE ARE NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR DAMAGES.
    B:removeErroringTileEntities=false
把两个false改为true即可。

replies.author: 東風导弹炸東京
replies.txt_content:
炫迈吃益达 发表于 2017-8-2 11:37
打开服务端文件夹-config-forge后
找到    # Set this to true to remove any Entity that throws an error ...
早就试过了 还是会崩

replies.author: WZRY
replies.txt_content:
東風导弹炸東京 发表于 2017-8-2 11:45
早就试过了 还是会崩
UTF数据格式异常 你估计是改了什么配置文件吧

replies.author: Astronomer
replies.txt_content:
NBT错误

你首先要知道是哪个玩家进入服务器会崩溃，然后/seen ID 看他的坐标位置

把地图下载下来用地图编辑器打开，删除那个坐标所在的区块

然后重新启动服务器即可
